ruleSearch.kind:
<js>
var tag=`{{$.vod_tag}}`;
var type_name=`{{$.type_name}}`;
function formatDate(timestamp) {
    var ts = Number(timestamp);
    var date = new Date(ts);
    var year = date.getFullYear();
    var month = String(date.getMonth() + 1).padStart(2, '0');
    var day = String(date.getDate()).padStart(2, '0');
    return `${year}/${month}/${day}`;
}
vod_time="{{$.vod_time.$date.$numberLong}}"
var formattedDate = formatDate(vod_time);
tag+","+type_name+","+formattedDate;
</js>
ruleSearch.name: $.vod_name

ruleToc.chapterList: var data = JSON.parse(result); var basevkey=baseUrl.match(/dname=(.*)&.*id.*/)[1]; var contentdata = data.posts if (["comichanman", "comic"].includes(basevkey)){ book.type=64; if (Array.isArray(contentdata)) { for (var i = 0; i < contentdata.length; i++) { var item = contentdata[i]; if (item.vod_content && typeof item.vod_content === 'string') { try { item.vod_content = JSON.parse(item.vod_content); } catch (e) { java.log("Ëß£ÊûêÂ§±Ë¥•: " + e); } } } } if (contentdata.length > 0) { var firstComic = contentdata[0]; var r=JSON.stringify(firstComic.vod_content, null, 2); } else { java.log("Ê≤°ÊúâÊº´ÁîªÊï∞ÊçÆ"); } //java.log(r) var comicdata = JSON.parse(r); var comicdatae = comicdata.eps; var name = comicdata.name; var id = comicdata.id; var resultArray = []; for (var i = 0; i < comicdatae.length; i++) { var chapter = comicdatae[i]; var ep = chapter.ep; var title = chapter.title; var imgMax = chapter.imgMax; var images = chapter.images; var imagesHtml = ""; if (name === "comic") { for (var j = 0; j < images.length; j++) { var imageUrl = images[j]; imagesHtml += `\n`; } } else { var maxImages = parseInt(imgMax); for (var j = 1; j <= maxImages; j++) { var imageUrl = `https://p.strongpsy.com/${name}/${id}/${ep}/${j}.jpg`; imagesHtml += `\n`; } } var chapterObj = { "id": id, "name": name, "ep": ep, "imgMax": imgMax, "chaptertitle": "Á¨¨"+title+"ËØù", "url": imagesHtml }; resultArray.push(chapterObj); } var finalJson = JSON.stringify(resultArray, null, 2); finalJson; }else if (["qapp", "modu","lebo","155","senlin"].includes(basevkey)) { book.type=8; var playUrlStr = contentdata[0].vod_play_url; var playList = playUrlStr.split('#').map(item => { var [chaptertitle, url] = item.split('$'); return { chaptertitle, url }; }); JSON.stringify(playList); } $[*]

searchUrl:
<js>
var variable=source.getVariable()
java.log(variable)
if (variable == "") {
  source.setVariable("0")
  }
function processKey(inputKey) {
    var modes = ['Êº´Áîª', 'Èü©Êº´', 'Á¶èÂà©Âß¨', 'ÈáåÁï™', 'Áü≠Ââß', 'COS', '3D', 'ÂéüÁ•û','Á¶èÂà©Âß¨2','ÂõΩ‰∫ßÂä®Êº´','Êó•Êú¨Âä®Êº´','Ê¨ßÁæéÂä®Êº´','Âä®Êº´ÁîµÂΩ±','ÈáåÁï™Âä®Êº´','‰∏≠ÊñáAV','‰º†Â™í'];
      var pattern = new RegExp('(?:\\s+)?@(' + modes.join('|') + ')(?=\\s*$)', 'gi');
    let lastMatch = null;
    let cleanKey = inputKey;    
    let match;
    while ((match = pattern.exec(inputKey)) !== null) {
        lastMatch = match[1]; 
    }
    cleanKey = inputKey.replace(pattern, '').trim();
    var typeIndex = lastMatch 
        ? modes.findIndex(mode => mode.toLowerCase() === lastMatch.toLowerCase()) 
        : 0;
    return {
        text: cleanKey,
        type: typeIndex !== -1 ? typeIndex : 0 
    };
}
var result = processKey(key);
var key=result.text
java.log(key)
var keyxmodev =variable
if(keyxmodev == 0){
	var keyxmode=result.type;
	}else{
		var keyxmode = keyxmodev-1
		}

if(keyxmode == 0){
	r=`/json-api/?dname=comic&pg=${page}&catid=20&key=${key}&mode=&tags=&v70=244421`
	}else if(keyxmode == 1) {
		r=`/json-api/?dname=comichanman&pg=${page}&catid=999&key=${key}&mode=&tags=&v70=244422`
		}else if(keyxmode == 2) {
		r=`/json-api/?dname=qapp&pg=${page}&catid=25&key=${key}&mode=&tags=&v70=244422`
}else if(keyxmode == 3) {
		r=`/json-api/?dname=qapp&pg=${page}&catid=26&key=${key}&mode=&tags=&v70=244422`
		}else if(keyxmode == 4){
			r=`/json-api/?dname=modu&pg=${page}&catid=&key=${key}&mode=&tags=&v70=244422`
				}else if(keyxmode == 5){
					r=`/json-api/?dname=comic&pg=${page}&catid=100&key=${key}&mode=&tags=&v70=244423`
				}else if(keyxmode == 6){
					r=`/json-api/?dname=qapp&pg=${page}&catid=22&key=${key}&mode=&tags=&v70=244423`
					}else if(keyxmode == 7){
						r=`/json-api/?dname=qapp&pg=${page}&catid=23&key=${key}&mode=&tags=&v70=244423`
						}else if(keyxmode == 8){
						r=`/json-api/?dname=lebo&pg=${page}&catid=33&key=${key}&mode&tags&v70=244423`
						}else if(keyxmode == 9){
						r=`/json-api/?dname=modu&pg=${page}&catid=1&key=${key}&mode=&tags=&v70=244423`
						}else if(keyxmode == 10){
						r=`/json-api/?dname=modu&pg=${page}&catid=2&key=${key}&mode=&tags=&v70=244423`
						}else if(keyxmode == 11){
						r=`/json-api/?dname=modu&pg=${page}&catid=3&key=${key}&mode=&tags=&v70=244423`
						}else if(keyxmode == 12){
						r=`/json-api/?dname=modu&pg=${page}&catid=5&key=${key}&mode=&tags=&v70=244423`
						}else if(keyxmode == 13){
						r=`/json-api/?dname=modu&pg=${page}&catid=6&key=${key}&mode=&tags=&v70=244423`
						}else if(keyxmode == 14){
						r=`/json-api/?dname=155&pg={page}&catid=6&key=${key}&mode=&tags=&v70=244423`
						}else if(keyxmode == 15){
						r=`/json-api/?dname=senlin&pg=${page}&catid=59&key=${key}&mode=&tags=&v70=244423`
						}
	r
</js>
